text: open Innovation is the notion that
organizations that have traditionally
looked inward to create products uh to
create scientific breakthroughs things
that Advance their business typically
are using people that look and act a
certain way it's the four walls of the
Enterprise the traditional not invented
here open Innovation tries to smash that
parad
and says you should be dealing with
individuals and organizations from all
over the world what's important is
pushing your business or your foundation
or your mission forward it's less
important how you get the Innovations
you need to do
that an organization that um wants to be
an open Innovation style company as an
example will'll typically look at all of
the projects in their portfolio all the
strategies all of the ways forward and
they will portfolio manage those
into different kinds of initiatives and
agendas that need to be pushed forward
as a business and then they'll choose
very strategically which of those will
go to the outside world which to the
inside World they may decide a new line
of business really needs to be acquiring
another company that's been done more
traditionally but when you get down to
Brass tax and you say you know what we

material for a product we want to take
to Market or we want to invite our
customers in to help us redesign the
Next Generation wireless network routing
Tech technology right that's when
organizations typically fall down a bit
so in this new world these or these
large organizations are saying from the
top down you know a substantial portion
of our Innovation is going to come from
